milestones.text: Familiarize with basic SEO concepts and use a free SEO tool to analyze a website's performance.
Conduct keyword research using an SEO tool and create a report on potential keywords for a specific website.
Develop and implement a comprehensive SEO strategy using multiple tools, tracking performance and making data-driven adjustments over a three-month period.

name: Serverless
description: Serverless computing allows developers to build and run applications without managing servers, enabling automatic scaling and reducing operational costs.

milestones.text: Deploy a simple serverless function using AWS Lambda or similar service.
Integrate multiple serverless functions to create a basic application workflow.
Design and implement a fully serverless architecture for a production-grade application.

name: Shiny
description: Shiny is an R package that enables users to create interactive web applications directly from R, enhancing data visualization and user engagement.

milestones.text: Create a simple Shiny app that displays a static plot using ggplot2.
Develop a Shiny app that includes user inputs and dynamic outputs, such as reactive plots.
Build a complex Shiny application with multiple tabs, custom CSS, and integrated APIs for real-time data.

name: SIEM Tools
description: SIEM tools are essential for security information and event management, enabling organizations to detect, analyze, and respond to security threats in real-time.

milestones.text: Successfully install and configure a basic SIEM tool in a lab environment.
Analyze and respond to simulated security incidents using SIEM tool alerts and dashboards.
Design and implement a comprehensive SIEM strategy for a medium-sized organization, including custom alerting and reporting.

name: Signal Processing
description: Signal processing involves analyzing, modifying, and synthesizing signals such as sound, images, and scientific measurements to extract useful information or improve signal quality.

milestones.text: Understand basic concepts of signals and systems, including time-domain and frequency-domain representations.
Implement basic signal processing algorithms using MATLAB or Python, such as filtering and Fourier transforms.
Develop and optimize complex signal processing systems for real-time applications, demonstrating proficiency in advanced techniques.

name: Simulink
description: Simulink is a graphical programming environment for modeling, simulating, and analyzing dynamic systems, widely used in engineering and control system design.

milestones.text: Create a simple Simulink model using basic blocks and run a simulation.
Develop a model that incorporates feedback control and analyze system response.
Implement a complex system model with custom blocks and perform optimization and validation.

name: SketchUp
description: SketchUp is a 3D modeling software used for architectural design, interior design, civil engineering, and more, enabling users to create detailed models and visualizations.

milestones.text: Complete a basic 3D model of a simple object using SketchUp.
Create a detailed architectural model with textures and materials in SketchUp.
Develop a comprehensive architectural project including site plans and presentations using SketchUp and LayOut.

assessments: Practical exam on creating a specific model

name: Slack
description: Slack is a collaboration tool that facilitates communication and project management through channels, direct messaging, and integrations with other applications, enhancing team productivity.

milestones.text: Create a Slack account and join a workspace.
Set up channels and manage notifications for effective communication.
Integrate Slack with at least three other tools to automate workflows.

name: Social Engineering
description: Social engineering involves manipulating individuals into divulging confidential information, often through psychological tactics. It is crucial for understanding security vulnerabilities and human behavior.

milestones.text: Identify and describe at least three common social engineering tactics used in cyber attacks.
Conduct a mock social engineering attack and analyze the effectiveness of the techniques used.
Develop a comprehensive social engineering awareness program for an organization, including training materials and assessment methods.

name: Software Development
description: Software development involves designing, coding, testing, and maintaining software applications to meet user needs and solve problems effectively and efficiently.

milestones.text: Complete a simple project using a programming language, demonstrating basic coding and debugging skills.
Develop a functional application with user authentication and database integration, showcasing understanding of software architecture.
Lead a software project from conception to deployment, implementing best practices in coding, testing, and project management.

name: Software Testing
description: Software testing is the process of evaluating and verifying that a software application or system meets specified requirements and functions correctly.

milestones.text: Understand basic testing concepts and terminology, and execute simple test cases.
Design and execute test plans, and report defects using a bug tracking tool.
Develop automated test scripts and implement a comprehensive testing strategy for complex applications.

name: SolidWorks
description: SolidWorks is a powerful 3D CAD software used for product design and engineering, enabling users to create detailed models and simulations efficiently.

milestones.text: Complete a basic tutorial on creating simple 3D shapes and assemblies in SolidWorks.
Design a functional mechanical part and create a detailed technical drawing from it.
Develop a complex assembly with multiple components and perform a simulation analysis to test functionality.

name: SOQL
description: SOQL (Salesforce Object Query Language) is a query language used to retrieve data from Salesforce databases, similar to SQL but tailored for Salesforce's architecture.

milestones.text: Write a basic SOQL query to retrieve records from a single Salesforce object.
Construct SOQL queries that include filtering, ordering, and aggregate functions.
Optimize complex SOQL queries for performance and implement them in Apex code.

name: Sorting Algorithms
description: Sorting algorithms are methods for arranging elements in a specific order, commonly used in computer science for efficient data organization and retrieval.

milestones.text: Implement a basic sorting algorithm, such as Bubble Sort, in a programming language of choice.
Analyze the time complexity of at least three different sorting algorithms and compare their efficiencies.
Develop and optimize a custom sorting algorithm that outperforms standard library implementations on large datasets.

assessments: Code review of sorting algorithm implementations
Performance benchmarking of different sorting algorithms
Written test on sorting algorithm concepts and complexities

name: spaCy
description: spaCy is an open-source library for advanced natural language processing in Python, designed for performance and ease of use in real-world applications.

milestones.text: Install spaCy and run a basic text processing pipeline on sample data.
Implement named entity recognition on a dataset and evaluate its accuracy.
Develop a custom spaCy pipeline component and integrate it into an existing application.

name: Spring Framework
description: Spring Framework is a powerful framework for building Java applications, providing comprehensive infrastructure support for developing Java-based enterprise applications.

milestones.text: Create a simple RESTful web service using Spring Boot.
Implement dependency injection and AOP in a Spring application.
Design and deploy a microservices architecture using Spring Cloud.

name: Sprints
description: Sprints are time-boxed iterations in Agile methodologies, allowing teams to focus on delivering specific features or improvements within a set timeframe, typically two to four weeks.

milestones.text: Participate in at least one sprint cycle as a team member.
Lead a sprint planning meeting and define sprint goals for a team.
Facilitate multiple sprints, ensuring continuous improvement and adaptation of processes.

name: SPSS
description: SPSS is a powerful statistical software used for data analysis, enabling users to perform complex statistical calculations and generate insightful reports.
aliases: Statistical Package for the Social Sciences

milestones.text: Complete a basic tutorial on SPSS and perform simple descriptive statistics on a sample dataset.
Conduct a regression analysis using SPSS and interpret the results in a report format.
Develop a comprehensive research project using SPSS, including data collection, analysis, and presentation of findings.

name: SQL
description: SQL is a standardized programming language used for managing and manipulating relational databases, enabling users to perform queries, updates, and data management tasks efficiently.

milestones.text: Write basic SQL queries to select data from a single table.
Create and manipulate tables, including inserting, updating, and deleting records.
Optimize complex queries and implement stored procedures and triggers.

name: SQL Developer
description: SQL Developers design and implement database solutions using SQL, ensuring data integrity, performance, and security in data management systems.

milestones.text: Write basic SQL queries to retrieve data from a single table.
Create and manage database schemas, including tables, indexes, and relationships.
Optimize complex SQL queries for performance and implement stored procedures and triggers.

name: SQLAlchemy
description: SQLAlchemy is a powerful SQL toolkit and Object-Relational Mapping (ORM) system for Python, enabling developers to interact with databases using Python objects.

milestones.text: Install SQLAlchemy and create a simple database connection using SQLite.
Build a basic CRUD application using SQLAlchemy to manage data in a relational database.
Implement complex queries and relationships in a large-scale application using SQLAlchemy.

name: SSH
description: SSH (Secure Shell) is a protocol used to securely access and manage network devices and servers over an unsecured network, ensuring data confidentiality and integrity.

milestones.text: Successfully connect to a remote server using SSH and execute basic commands.
Configure SSH key-based authentication and manage user access on a server.
Implement SSH tunneling for secure data transmission and troubleshoot complex SSH connection issues.

assessments: Project demonstrating secure server access using SSH

name: SSMS
description: SQL Server Management Studio (SSMS) is a powerful tool for managing SQL Server databases, providing a graphical interface for database development, administration, and querying.

milestones.text: Install SSMS and connect to a SQL Server instance successfully.
Create and execute basic SQL queries using the query editor in SSMS.
Design and implement a database schema, including tables, relationships, and stored procedures.

assessments: Hands-on test with database management tasks

name: Stakeholder Management
description: Stakeholder management involves identifying, analyzing, and engaging stakeholders to ensure their needs and expectations are met throughout a project or initiative.

milestones.text: Identify key stakeholders for a small project and document their interests and influence.
Develop a stakeholder engagement plan that outlines communication strategies for at least three different stakeholder groups.
Lead a stakeholder workshop to gather feedback and align project objectives with stakeholder expectations, resulting in a documented consensus.

name: Stand-up Meetings
description: Stand-up meetings are short, daily team gatherings designed to provide updates, synchronize efforts, and address obstacles, fostering collaboration and accountability within teams.

milestones.text: Participate in at least 10 stand-up meetings and share updates on personal tasks.
Facilitate a stand-up meeting for a team of at least 5 members for 4 consecutive weeks.
Implement improvements based on feedback from 3 stand-up meetings, enhancing team communication and efficiency.

name: Stata
description: Stata is a powerful statistical software used for data analysis, manipulation, and visualization, widely utilized in research, economics, and social sciences.

milestones.text: Complete a basic tutorial on Stata and perform simple data import and export tasks.
Conduct a regression analysis using Stata and interpret the output correctly.
Develop a comprehensive statistical report using Stata, including advanced modeling techniques and visualizations.

assessments: Peer review of Stata code and output

name: STEM Education
description: STEM Education focuses on teaching science, technology, engineering, and mathematics in an integrated manner, fostering critical thinking and problem-solving skills in students.

milestones.text: Develop a basic understanding of STEM concepts and their importance in education.
Create and implement a simple STEM lesson plan that integrates multiple disciplines.
Design a comprehensive STEM curriculum that aligns with educational standards and promotes critical thinking.

name: STL

milestones.text: Understand basic STL components like vectors and lists, and write simple programs using them.
Implement algorithms using STL functions and utilize iterators for traversing data structures.
Create custom data structures and algorithms leveraging STL features for complex applications.

name: Strategic Planning
description: Strategic planning involves defining an organization's direction and making decisions on allocating resources to pursue this strategy effectively and efficiently.

milestones.text: Understand the basic concepts of strategic planning and its importance in business.
Develop a simple strategic plan for a small project or initiative.
Lead a comprehensive strategic planning process for an organization, including stakeholder engagement and resource allocation.

name: Surveys
description: Surveys are structured tools used to gather information, opinions, or feedback from individuals, often employed in research, marketing, and data collection.

milestones.text: Create a simple survey with 5-10 questions using an online tool.
Analyze survey results and present findings in a report.
Design and implement a comprehensive survey project, including sampling and statistical analysis.

name: SVN

milestones.text: Successfully install SVN and perform basic commands like checkout, update, and commit.
Manage branches and merges in a collaborative project using SVN.
Implement and manage a complete SVN repository with access control and backup strategies.

name: Swagger/OpenAPI
description: Swagger/OpenAPI is a specification for defining APIs, enabling developers to create, document, and consume RESTful web services effectively and efficiently.

milestones.text: Create a simple API definition using Swagger/OpenAPI format.
Implement an API using Swagger/OpenAPI and generate documentation automatically.
Design and publish a comprehensive API specification with multiple endpoints and authentication methods.

name: Swift
description: Swift is a powerful and intuitive programming language developed by Apple for building apps on iOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS platforms, emphasizing performance and safety.

milestones.text: Complete a basic Swift programming course and write a simple command-line application.
Develop a functional iOS app using Swift and publish it on the App Store.

name: Symfony

assessments: Code review of a Symfony project
Building a small application using Symfony

name: Synopsys Design Compiler

milestones.text: Complete a basic project using Synopsys Design Compiler to synthesize a simple RTL design.
Optimize a mid-complexity design using Design Compiler, achieving target timing and area constraints.

name: Synopsys IC Compiler
description: Synopsys IC Compiler is a leading tool for digital design implementation, enabling efficient synthesis, placement, and routing of integrated circuits in semiconductor design.

milestones.text: Complete a basic tutorial on using Synopsys IC Compiler for simple digital designs.
Successfully implement a mid-complexity design project using IC Compiler, demonstrating placement and routing.
Lead a project that optimizes a complex design using advanced features of IC Compiler, achieving timing closure.

name: Synopsys PrimeTime
description: Synopsys PrimeTime is a leading static timing analysis tool used in the semiconductor industry for verifying timing closure in digital designs.

milestones.text: Complete a basic tutorial on using Synopsys PrimeTime for static timing analysis.
Successfully analyze a small digital design project using Synopsys PrimeTime and generate timing reports.
Optimize a complex digital design for timing closure using advanced features of Synopsys PrimeTime.

assessments: Peer review of timing analysis reports

name: SystemVerilog

milestones.text: Write basic SystemVerilog code to describe simple digital circuits.

Implement complex verification environments using UVM in SystemVerilog for large-scale projects.

name: T-SQL
description: T-SQL is an extension of SQL used primarily for managing and manipulating data in Microsoft SQL Server databases, enhancing standard SQL with additional features.

milestones.text: Write basic SELECT queries to retrieve data from a single table.
Create and execute stored procedures to encapsulate complex queries.
Optimize query performance using indexing and execution plans.

name: TCL
description: TCL (Tool Command Language) is a scripting language commonly used for rapid prototyping, scripted applications, and GUIs, known for its simplicity and extensibility.

milestones.text: Write a simple TCL script that prints 'Hello, World!' to the console.
Create a TCL script that uses loops and conditionals to process a list of numbers.
Develop a GUI application using TCL and Tk that allows users to input and manipulate data.

name: TCP/IP

milestones.text: Understand the basic concepts of TCP/IP and its role in networking.

Design and implement a network using TCP/IP protocols, ensuring optimal performance and security.

name: TDD
description: Test-Driven Development (TDD) is a software development approach where tests are written before the code, ensuring that the code meets requirements and reduces bugs.

milestones.text: Write and run a simple test case using a testing framework.
Implement a small feature using TDD, including writing tests before the code.
Lead a project using TDD practices, ensuring all code is covered by tests.

name: TensorBoard
description: TensorBoard is a visualization tool for TensorFlow that helps in understanding, debugging, and optimizing machine learning models through interactive visualizations.

milestones.text: Set up TensorBoard and visualize basic metrics from a simple TensorFlow model.
Create custom visualizations for model performance and loss metrics over training epochs.
Integrate TensorBoard with complex models and utilize advanced features like embedding visualizations and custom scalars.

name: TensorFlow Lite
description: TensorFlow Lite is a lightweight version of TensorFlow designed for mobile and embedded devices, enabling efficient machine learning inference on resource-constrained environments.

milestones.text: Successfully install TensorFlow Lite and run a sample model on a mobile device.
Convert a TensorFlow model to TensorFlow Lite format and deploy it on an Android or iOS application.
Optimize a complex machine learning model for performance and size, achieving a specific inference speed on a target device.

name: Terraform
description: Terraform is an open-source infrastructure as code tool that allows users to define and provision data center infrastructure using a declarative configuration language.

milestones.text: Create and apply a simple Terraform configuration to provision a single resource.
Utilize Terraform modules to organize and reuse code for multiple resources.
Implement a complete infrastructure setup using Terraform with multiple providers and manage state effectively.

milestones.text: Understand the basic principles of text generation and create simple text outputs using predefined templates.
Implement a basic text generation model using libraries like TensorFlow or PyTorch and evaluate its performance.
Develop a sophisticated text generation system that can adapt to various contexts and produce high-quality, human-like text.

name: Tidyverse
description: The Tidyverse is a collection of R packages designed for data science, providing tools for data manipulation, visualization, and analysis in a cohesive framework.

milestones.text: Install and load the Tidyverse package in R and perform basic data manipulation using dplyr.
Create visualizations using ggplot2 and perform data cleaning with tidyr on a dataset.

name: Timing Analysis
description: Timing analysis is the process of evaluating the timing performance of digital circuits to ensure they meet required specifications and function correctly under various conditions.

milestones.text: Understand the basic concepts of timing analysis and its importance in digital circuit design.
Perform static timing analysis on simple digital circuits using industry-standard tools.

name: To-Do List Apps (Todoist, Asana)

milestones.text: Install TorchServe and serve a simple PyTorch model with default configurations.

milestones.text: Understand the basic architecture of Transformers and their components, such as attention mechanisms and positional encoding.
Implement a simple Transformer model from scratch and train it on a small dataset for a text classification task.

name: Trees

milestones.text: Understand the basic concept of trees and their components such as nodes and edges.
Implement basic tree operations like insertion, deletion, and traversal (in-order, pre-order, post-order).

milestones.text: Create a basic Trello board with at least three lists and five cards.
Implement labels, due dates, and checklists in a Trello board for a team project.
Integrate Trello with at least two other tools and automate workflows using Power-Ups.

name: Troubleshooting
description: Troubleshooting is the systematic process of diagnosing and resolving problems in technology, systems, or processes to ensure optimal functionality and performance.

milestones.text: Successfully resolve basic technical issues using provided documentation and support resources.

milestones.text: Conduct a basic user interview with a structured set of questions and gather feedback from at least three participants.

name: UserTesting.com

milestones.text: Create and conduct a basic user test using UserTesting.com with at least 5 participants.

milestones.text: Understand the basic concepts of vector databases and their applications in machine learning.

name: Waterfall
description: Waterfall is a linear project management methodology that emphasizes a sequential design process, where each phase must be completed before the next begins.

milestones.text: Understand the basic principles and phases of the Waterfall methodology.
Successfully manage a small project using the Waterfall methodology from initiation to closure.
Lead a complex project using Waterfall, ensuring all phases are completed on time and within budget.

name: Web Application Security
description: Web Application Security involves protecting web applications from vulnerabilities and threats, ensuring data integrity, confidentiality, and availability through various security measures and best practices.

milestones.text: Understand basic web application vulnerabilities such as SQL Injection and Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).
Conduct a security assessment of a web application using tools like OWASP ZAP and identify vulnerabilities.
Develop and implement a comprehensive security strategy for a web application, including secure coding practices and regular security audits.

name: Web Browsers
description: Web browsers are software applications used to access and navigate the internet, displaying web pages and enabling user interaction with online content.

milestones.text: Successfully install and configure a web browser on a computer or mobile device.
Utilize browser developer tools to inspect elements and debug simple web pages.
Develop and deploy a web application that is fully functional across multiple web browsers.

assessments: Quiz on browser features and functionalities

name: Web Development
description: Web development involves creating and maintaining websites, encompassing both front-end and back-end development to deliver a seamless user experience.

milestones.text: Create a simple static website using HTML and CSS.
Develop a dynamic website with user authentication and a database connection.
Build a full-stack web application using a modern framework and deploy it to a cloud platform.

name: Webpack
description: Webpack is a powerful module bundler for JavaScript applications, enabling developers to manage dependencies, optimize assets, and improve application performance efficiently.

milestones.text: Set up a basic Webpack configuration to bundle a simple JavaScript application.
Implement loaders and plugins in Webpack to handle CSS and image files in a project.
Optimize a large-scale application using code splitting and caching strategies in Webpack.

name: Whiteboarding
description: Whiteboarding is a collaborative technique used to visually communicate ideas, concepts, and solutions during brainstorming sessions or problem-solving discussions.

milestones.text: Successfully facilitate a simple brainstorming session using a whiteboard to capture ideas from at least three participants.
Create a structured visual representation of a complex problem on a whiteboard, incorporating feedback from team members.
Lead a multi-disciplinary team in a whiteboarding session to develop a comprehensive solution, resulting in actionable next steps documented.

name: Whiteboards
description: Whiteboards are versatile tools used for brainstorming, planning, and visualizing ideas in collaborative environments, enhancing communication and creativity among team members.

milestones.text: Successfully facilitate a brainstorming session using a whiteboard with at least five participants.
Create a structured visual plan on a whiteboard that outlines a project timeline and key milestones.
Lead a workshop using a whiteboard to synthesize complex ideas and achieve consensus among diverse stakeholders.

assessments: Observation of whiteboard usage in meetings
Self-assessment of visual clarity and engagement

name: Windows Server
description: Windows Server is a server operating system designed by Microsoft, providing a platform for enterprise-level applications, file storage, and network management functionalities.

milestones.text: Install and configure Windows Server on a virtual machine.
Set up and manage Active Directory and user accounts.
Implement and manage a Windows Server cluster for high availability.

name: Wireframing
description: Wireframing is the process of creating a visual guide that represents the skeletal framework of a website or application, focusing on layout and functionality.

milestones.text: Create a basic wireframe for a simple webpage using paper or digital tools.
Develop a wireframe for a multi-page website, incorporating user flows and navigation.
Produce a high-fidelity interactive wireframe that includes detailed annotations and user interactions.

name: WordPress
description: WordPress is a powerful content management system (CMS) used for building websites and blogs, offering extensive customization through themes and plugins.

milestones.text: Successfully install and set up a WordPress site with a basic theme.
Create and customize a WordPress theme using the WordPress Customizer and basic CSS.
Develop a custom WordPress plugin that adds specific functionality to a site.

name: Workbench
description: A workbench is a physical or digital space where tasks are organized, tools are available, and projects are executed efficiently, enhancing productivity and collaboration.

milestones.text: Set up a basic workbench environment using a tool like Trello or Notion.
Create and manage a project workflow with multiple tasks and team members in a workbench tool.
Optimize and customize a workbench for a team, integrating multiple tools and automating workflows.

name: WSL
description: Windows Subsystem for Linux (WSL) allows users to run a Linux environment directly on Windows without the overhead of a virtual machine.

milestones.text: Install WSL and run a basic Linux command in the terminal.
Set up a development environment using WSL with a specific programming language.
Integrate WSL with Visual Studio Code for a seamless development experience.

assessments: Peer review of WSL-based development setup

name: Xcode
description: Xcode is an integrated development environment (IDE) for macOS used for developing applications for iOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS platforms with a range of tools.

milestones.text: Install Xcode and create a simple 'Hello World' application.
Build a functional iOS app using UIKit and implement basic navigation.
Develop a complex app with multiple screens, using Core Data and integrating third-party libraries.

name: Xilinx Vivado
description: Xilinx Vivado is a design suite for synthesizing and analyzing hardware description languages, primarily used for FPGA and SoC development in electronic engineering.

milestones.text: Complete a basic tutorial on creating and simulating a simple FPGA design using Vivado.
Successfully implement a functional digital circuit design on an FPGA using Vivado and demonstrate it.
Design and optimize a complex system-on-chip (SoC) project using Vivado, including custom IP integration.

name: XML
description: XML is a markup language used for encoding documents in a format that is both human-readable and machine-readable, facilitating data interchange between systems.

milestones.text: Create a simple XML document with basic elements and attributes.
Implement XML parsing using a programming language like Python or Java.
Design and validate complex XML schemas for data interchange.

name: YAML
description: YAML is a human-readable data serialization format often used for configuration files and data exchange between languages with different data structures.

milestones.text: Create a simple YAML file to define a basic configuration for a sample application.
Implement a multi-document YAML file that configures multiple services in a Docker Compose setup.
Develop a complex YAML schema that validates configurations for a large-scale application deployment.

name: YOLO
description: YOLO (You Only Look Once) is a real-time object detection system that processes images quickly and accurately, making it ideal for various applications in computer vision.

milestones.text: Implement a basic YOLO model to detect objects in a static image.
Train a YOLO model on a custom dataset and evaluate its performance.
Optimize a YOLO model for real-time object detection on a video stream.

name: Zeplin
description: Zeplin is a collaboration tool that streamlines the design handoff process between designers and developers, enhancing communication and efficiency in project workflows.

milestones.text: Create a basic project in Zeplin and import designs from Sketch or Figma.
Collaborate with a team by sharing a project and managing design specifications.
Integrate Zeplin with version control systems and automate design updates for ongoing projects.

name: zsh
description: Zsh is a powerful shell designed for interactive use, offering features like improved scripting capabilities, customization, and enhanced user experience compared to traditional shells.

milestones.text: Install Zsh and configure a basic .zshrc file with aliases and environment variables.
Create custom functions and scripts in Zsh to automate repetitive tasks.
Develop a fully customized Zsh environment with plugins and themes for enhanced productivity.

name: CNN
description: Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN) are a class of deep learning algorithms primarily used for image processing and computer vision tasks, enabling automated feature extraction.

milestones.text: Implement a basic CNN model using a popular framework like Keras or TensorFlow on a standard dataset like MNIST.
Train a CNN model on a custom dataset and achieve at least 80% accuracy on a validation set.
Design and optimize a CNN architecture for a complex image classification task, achieving state-of-the-art performance metrics.
